n/a
surgical correction if the hernia becomes strangulated
large paraesophageal hiatal hernia
paraesophageal hernia
different types of hiatal hernia include sliding, paraesophageal, and a combination of the two.
64 year old woman with hiatal hernia and atelectasis on chest radiograph
